DOC.brief_summary: About 40 % of the patients in reanimation are thrombopenics and the causes are not well known (reduction in platelet's production, increase in their destruction...). This protocol studies the epidemiology of thrombopenia for these patients and the impacts of cost and mortality in order to bring patients best medical cares.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Incidence, of Mechanisms and Prognosis of the Thrombopenia From Patients of Reanimation.
